summary: This is a 2021 email from the U.S. Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York, transmitting a task order for commercial scanning/document management services from CACI under a government contract. It details the contract period, value, and payment instructions, and is part of the Epstein case document release (EFTA00015645).

persons.name: Contract Specialist (FAC-C/COR HI)
persons.context: The sender of the email from the U.S. Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York, providing the task order and payment instructions.

events.title: Task Order Issued for Document Management
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York, issues a task order to CACI for commercial scanning/document management services under contract GS-25F-0131M.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York, 86 Chambers St., New York, N.Y. 10007
keyFacts: The document is a 2021 administrative task order for scanning/document management services related to the Epstein case files.
The contract is between the U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) and CACI, with a performance period from March 24, 2021, to May 31, 2021.
The document reference (EFTA00015645) indicates it is part of the publicly released Epstein case document set.
The email shows ongoing administrative and document management activities by the SDNY related to the case years after Epstein's death.
